title: Ham and leek potato gratin
directions: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 6-cup (1.5L) ovenproof dish. Arrange one-third of the potato in the prepared dish. Top with half the ham, garlic, onion, leek and thyme. Sprinkle with one-third of the cheddar. Continue layering with remaining potato, ham, garlic, onion, leek, thyme and cheddar, finishing with the potato and cheddar.
Combine the cream, sour cream and stock in a jug. Season. Carefully pour the cream mixture over the potato mixture in the dish.
Bake for 1 hour or until the sauce thickens and the potato is golden brown and tender.
Set the potato gratin aside for 10 mins to rest before serving.
ingredients: 1 leek, pale section only, thinly sliced
